name: Messenger Plus! Live Skin Pack
summary: Learn about .PLSK files and view a list of programs that open them.

windows.name: Open over 400 file formats with File Viewer Plus.Free Download

content: NOTE: Windows Live Messenger was discontinued in 2013 and has moved to Skype.

description: Skin that can be applied to the interface of Windows Live Messenger (WLM), a popular instant messaging program for Windows; requires the Messenger Plus! Live add-on, which provides extra functionality for WLM.
